Title: Dedicates a portion of the state highway system to Assembly Member Bobby D'Andrea
Summary: Dedicates all that portion of the state highway system constituting bridge number 1007069, located on Union Avenue, state route 9P, crossing interstate 87 in the city of Saratoga Springs, county of Saratoga, to Assembly Member Bobby D'Andrea.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to dedicating a portion of the state highway system to Assembly Member Bobby D'Andrea
